26 #define ADVERTISE_TRIGGER advertiseService<std_srvs::Trigger::Request, std_srvs::Trigger::Response>
27 #define BIND_CALLBACK(cb) std::bind(cb, std::placeholders::_1, std::placeholders::_2, std::ref(franka_panda))
28

137 
146 int main(int argc, char **argv)
147 {
148  ros::init(argc, argv, NODE_NAME);
149  ros::NodeHandle node_handle;
150  ros::AsyncSpinner async_spinner(std::thread::hardware_concurrency());
151  async_spinner.start();
152 
153  // initialize visualization
154  Visualizer::init(node_handle);
155 
156  // initialize robot abstaction
157  FrankaPanda franka_panda(node_handle);
158 
159  // advertise services
160  ros::ServiceServer srvs[] = {
161  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(CAPTURE_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(captureCallback)),
162  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(DETECT_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(detectCallback)),
163  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PLAN_APPROACH_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(planApproachCallback)),
164  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(APPROACH_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(approachCallback)),
165  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PLAN_PICK_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(planPickCallback)),
166  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PICK_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(pickCallback)),
167  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PLAN_LIFT_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(planLiftCallback)),
168  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(LIFT_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(liftCallback)),
169  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PLAN_LIFT_ALT_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(planLiftAltCallback)),
170  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(LIFT_ALT_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(liftAltCallback)),
171  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PLAN_PLACE_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(planPlaceCallback)),
172  node_handle.ADVERTISE_TRIGGER(PLACE_SERVICE, BIND_CALLBACK(placeCallback)),
173  };
174 
175  // shutdown node when msg on shutdown-topic arrives
176  ros::topic::waitForMessage<std_msgs::Empty>(SHUTDOWN_TOPIC);
177  ros::shutdown();
178  return 0;
179 }

181 static bool captureCallback(const std_srvs::Trigger::Request& request, std_srvs::Trigger::Response& response, FrankaPanda& franka_panda)
182 {
183  response.success = franka_panda.capture();
184  return true;
185 }
